Airbomber sighs and starts to fall asleep from boredom...
  ----- Original =
Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: S=
unday, August 13, 2000 1:18 AM
  Subject: Re: Airbomber and Infectra...


 =
 Infectra


  Infectra:  "Hmm....There are only two of us and there could b=
e many of them. I'm not sure."


  *Infectra says to Airbomber*

    ----- =
Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    =
Sent: Sunday, August 13, 2000 1:12 AM
    Subject: Re: Airbomber and Infect=
ra...


    Airbomber honestly didn't know where to go.

    "Want to attac=
k a base?" Airbomber asked Infectra...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
=
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Satu=
rday, August 12, 2000 8:50 PM
      Subject: Re: Airbomber and Infectra...
=


      Infectra

       
       
      *Infectra begins walking while look=
ing around herself*

      Infectra:  "Are we going in any place particular=
?"

      *Infectra asks Airbomber*

        ----- Original Message ----- 
=
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Saturd=
ay, August 12, 2000 7:05 PM
        Subject: Re: Airbomber and Infectra...
=


        Airbomber took Infectra's hand and started to walk...
          -=
---- Original Message ----- 
          From: ilovealllizards 
          To:=
 nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 10:21 PM
     =
     Subject: Re: Airbomber and Infectra...


          Infectra


        =
  Infectra: "I don't know, I guess he just doesn't want to come.."


      =
    *Infectra says to Airbomber while frowning*
            ----- Original =
Message ----- 
            From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
            Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 10:11 PM
            Subject: =
Re: Airbomber and Infectra...


            "Okay. Hey, Stranato!" Airbombe=
r called.

            "Go away! Having fun with friends!" Stranato called =
out.

            "I thought we were his friends." Airbomber said sadly...
=
              ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: iloveallliz=
ards 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Friday, Aug=
ust 11, 2000 9:55 PM
              Subject: Re: Airbomber w/ Infectra...


=
              Infectra

              *Infectra leaves the base and stands =
next to Airbomber and starts thinking*


              Infectra: "Umm...Sho=
uld we see if anyone else wants to go with us?"

              *Infectra as=
ks Airbomber with a smile*

                ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
               From: THECODE 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
     =
           Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 9:38 PM
                Subject: R=
e: Airbomber w/ Infectra...


                Airbomber left the base and l=
ooked off into the distance. He started to feel bad about this, they didn't=
 have any friends to help them if they got into trouble...
                =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: ilovealllizards 
  =
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Friday, Aug=
ust 11, 2000 8:36 PM
                  Subject: Re: Airbomber w/ Infectra..=
.


                  Infectra

                  *Infectra smiles*

      =
            Infectra: "Indeed, we shall be off."

                  *Infect=
ra says to Airbomber as she opens the door leading out of their room*

    =
                ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From: THE=
CODE 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    Sent:=
 Friday, August 11, 2000 6:40 PM
                    Subject: Re: Airbomber=
 w/ Infectra...


                    Airbomber takes her hand.

          =
          "We can make the Maximals proud." Airbomber said...
             =
         ----- Original Message ----- 
                      From: iloveall=
lizards 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    =
  Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 4:24 AM
                      Subject: Re: =
Airbomber w/ Infectra...


                      Infectra


               =
       Infectra: "Hmm...Sounds good to me."

                      *Infectr=
a stands up*

                      Infectra: "Shall we?"

                =
      *Infectra says to Airbomber smiling holding her hand out*

          =
              ----- Original Message ----- 
                        From: T=
HECODE 
                        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                   =
     Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 3:29 AM
                        Subject:=
 Airbomber w/ Infectra...


                        "So, want to gop outsid=
e or something? See the world, capture out first Preds?" Airbomber asked In=
fectra. He lenaed over and kissed her...
